item.title: Research
item.description: Research Interests My research interests are currently focused on the intersection of comparative political behavior & institutions and quantitative methodology. My substantive interests specifically looks at the ways in which institutional arragenments shape voters’ preferences among parties. I supplement this with methodological research questions about the ways to improve our ability to estimate the effects of institutional arrangements on voters and accurately estimate the spatial and spatio-temporal effects of institutions on voter behavior.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Current Courses N/A Past Courses TA POLS 200: Foundations of Political Science [Fall 2023, Prof. Todd Kent]
